meta.Title: WITH CLUES FROM THE NEWS [New York Times, Sunday, February 13, 1944]
meta.Author: Louis Shields

across.question: Seaport at foot of Mount Etna.
Seven bright stars in Ursa Major.

down.question: Commander of British, French and U. S. Armies, 1918.
